name: Active Webcam Video File
summary: Learn about .AWLIVE files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Active Webcam is used for surveillance and security systems. Capable of recording and broadcasting simultaneously from numerous different video devices, such as web cameras, camcorders, and network IP cameras. Broadcasts live video and audio by streaming through a web server, HTTP software, or by FTP upload. Footage recorded by cameras through this software can be viewed from any location using an Internet browser.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
